code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:50 YO m haberdasher presents with progressive mild easy bruising and mild non pruritic rash for past 4 weeks. o:Height 188 cm, Weight 78.1 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 61, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC.

s:pt presents with mild non pruritic rash and mild easy bruising x 7 weeks. he is a 51 yr old white male haberdasher. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life denies any alcohol use o:Height 187 cm, Weight 75.6 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, Skin = pink, no pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Idiopathic Thrombocytic Purpura p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed dexamethasone - 40 mg daily x 4 days, and ordered CBC.

content2.Unmatched: his life denies any alcohol use
